name: Yuki
description: Track and share your GD scores to Discord. Link your Discord account, and your passes/fails are automatically recorded. Use /recent in Discord to show your latest play - just like osu!

auto-submit.name: Auto Submit Scores
auto-submit.description: Automatically send scores to server when you pass or fail a level

submit-fails.name: Submit Failed Attempts
submit-fails.description: Also send scores when you fail or quit a level
